lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. Department of Justice consent decree that would require Baker to sell its drilling bit operations and submersible pump business, met yesterday and threatened to terminate the proposed merger.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The uncertainty as to the price and conditions that might be imposed by the Department of Justice makes us very nervous about what the outcome might be," Kistler said, in explaining why Hughes had made the counter proposal.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He also expressed concern that the combined companies might be required by the government's conditions to license some of its technology to any purchaser of the assets.
